summary: This document outlines the Articles of Organization for a limited liability company named NICE, LLC, established in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It details the company's purpose, management structure, and liability limitations for its members and managers.

persons.name: Erika A. Kellerhals
persons.context: Erika A. Kellerhals is identified as the Organizer of the limited liability company NICE, LLC, and has signed the Articles of Organization.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.context: Lawrence Visoski is named as the initial manager of the company NICE, LLC.

locations: 9100 Port of Sale Mall, Suite 15, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The document establishes NICE, LLC as a limited liability company in the U.S. Virgin Islands.
Erika A. Kellerhals is the Organizer of the company and has signed the Articles of Organization.
Lawrence Visoski is appointed as the initial manager of the company.
The company is structured to have perpetual duration and is manager-managed.
The initial capital for the company is set at $1,000.
